name: Horrible Monsters, Chill Conversations
description:
A relaxing horror game to study/relax with.

Make a trip in the idyllic German forests with lo-fi beats, a twilight sky and the occasional hitchhicker. Find horrible monsters, have chill conversations. Nothing can hurt you.

~

This game was developed under two weeks for the IGDA Foundation Game Jam 2022.

-

CREDITS:

Art: Casilda de Zulueta

Code: Raheel Yawar

Music: Lo-fi Chill by newsense, under Envato Market's Music Standard License.
